Returns: The status of this request for a recipient. One of @B_com#google#android#gms#games#request#GameRequest#RECIPIENT_STATUS_ACCEPTED_E@ or @B_com#google#android#gms#games#request#GameRequest#RECIPIENT_STATUS_PENDING_E@.

Returns: The player that sent the request.
getSender().Description: Retrieves the information about the player that sent the request.

getRecipients().Description: Retrieves the information about all the players that the request was sent to.

Returns: whether or not the object is valid for use.
isDataValid().Description: Check to see if this object is valid for use. If the object is still volatile, this method will indicate whether or not the object can be safely used. The output of a call to @B_com#google#android#gms#common#data#Freezable#freeze_E@ will always be valid.

ClassDesc: Data object representing the data for a request. This is immutable, and therefore safe to cache or store. Note, however, that the data it represents may grow stale. This class exists solely to support parceling these objects and should not be used directly.
